Simulate health care sector costs from simulated HAQ score

Simulate health care sector costs from HAQ score simulated using sim_haq

sim_hc_cost(simhaq, weight, pars,
  cdmards.ind = which(therapy.pars$info[["sname"]] == "cdmards"),
  tcz.ind = which(therapy.pars$info[["sname"]] == "tcz"),
  tczmtx.ind = which(therapy.pars$info[["sname"]] == "tczmtx"),
  check = TRUE)

Arguments

simhaq

Simulation output from sim_haq.
weight

Weight of patient. Used to calculate treatment costs when dosing is based on weight.
pars

List of sampled parameter values. The format is the same as the ouptut produced with sample_pars. The list must contain:

treat.cost

Matrix of treatment cost data.

hosp.cost

List of two matrices used to simulate hospital costs.

mgmt.cost

Matrix of general management costs.
cdmards.ind

Index for cDMARDs.
tcz.ind

Index for tocilizumab.
tczmtx.ind

Index for tocilizuma + methotrexate.
check

Should the function check parameters and input data passed to the model? Default is TRUE.

Value

Matrix. First column is simulated pain score and second column is simulated utility.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
